page.title: 08Peak Dale Village Fete
page.content: On 9th June,1985 it was the Peak Dale Village Fete. In the morning Rev Baiden (the Methodist Minister) and Mr Richards (Headmaster at Peak Dale Primary School) judged the entries for the Decorated House and Decorated Door Competitions. At 2 o'clock everybody went to the playing field.The Fancy Dress, Decorated Bikes and Prams,and Decorated Float Competitions were judged.Then the procession set off round the village, and then went to the school playground. At the school Bill Waddington opened the Fete.Bill Waddington plays Percy Sugden in Coronation Street.Then Debbie Briddon,the retiring Queen, crowned the new Village Queen Alison Jones,and the retiring Rosebud, Michelle Wood,crowned the new Rosebud,
